item.title: Get the version of your Maven project on command line?
item.description: I bet you have been faced with the situation to get the version of your Maven project on command line? So the question is how to get it? I have seen many solutions via using Linux tools like grep, cat or awk etc. also seen many solutions like using exec-maven-plugin like this: VERSION=$(mvn -q \ -Dexec.executable="echo" \ -Dexec.args='${project.version}' \ --non-recursive \ org.codehaus.mojo:exec-maven-plugin:1.6.0:exec) Unfortunately the above approach will not work on Windows.
